channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Newsmax avoids trial with $67 million settlement over false 2020 election claims
item.description: Newsmax claimed its coverage was "fair, balanced, and conducted within professional standards of journalism," even though a judge ruled it had defamed...

item.title: Kumail Nanjiani says Elon Musk did not like HBO’s ‘Silicon Valley’: ‘He was like, all the parties I go to are much cooler than these parties’
item.description: In 2018, Musk vigorously denied he had attended a “sex party,” saying he thought it was just a costume party.

item.title: Duolingo CEO admits his controversial AI memo ‘did not give enough context’ and insists the company never laid off full-time employees
item.description: After receiving backlash for a staff memo posted on LinkedIn, the Duolingo CEO is clarifying that full-time roles are safe.

item.title: Dealer Known as ‘Ketamine Queen’ to Plead Guilty in Matthew Perry Case
item.description: Jasveen Sangha will plead guilty to selling the ketamine that killed the “Friends” star, prosecutors said. She could face decades in prison.

item.title: Immigration Enforcement Takes Key Role in Trump’s D.C. Crime Crackdown
item.description: Immigrants who live and work in the city say they want violent crime lowered but fear that ICE efforts could make it worse.

item.title: Why Rip Currents From Hurricane Erin Are So Dangerous to the East Coast
item.description: Rip currents are the third leading cause of deaths from hurricanes, and they can happen on a sunny day hundreds of miles from the storm.

item.title: Sam Altman admits OpenAI ‘totally screwed up’ its GPT-5 launch and says the company will spend trillions of dollars on data centers
item.description: Altman also said that he thinks we’re in an AI “bubble.”

item.title: Republican Bid to Help Trump Move Past Epstein Falls Flat
item.description: Republicans in Congress managed to recess for the summer without voting on the issue, but it has continued to dog them and awaits them when they retur...

item.title: Hamas Accepts New Gaza Cease-Fire Proposal, Officials Say
item.description: It was unclear whether Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel was on board with the terms, which came as Qatar and Egypt were intensifying mediat...

item.title: Wayfair CFO says sellers on the company’s $12 billion marketplace are trying to ‘insulate’ customers from tariffs
item.description: Wayfair has been on a rocky ride over the past five years.

item.title: What to Know About Russia-U.S.-Ukraine Peace Talks
item.description: The president of Ukraine and his European allies are visiting the White House, after President Trump backed Russia’s plan to end the war.

item.title: Israel Is in Talks to Send Gazans to South Sudan, Officials Say
item.description: Israel has broadened its push, so far unsuccessful, to persuade other countries to take in Gazans en masse. Critics say the relocation could violate i...

item.title: Hamas Accepts New Gaza Cease-Fire Proposal, Officials Say
item.description: It was unclear whether Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel was on board with the terms, which came as Qatar and Egypt were intensifying mediat...

item.title: Russia Reaffirms Opposition to NATO Troops in Ukraine
Live Updates: Zelensky and European Leaders Press for Security Guarantees in Meeting with Trump
item.description: President Volodymyr Zelensky of Ukraine said that a full prisoner exchange was also essential to ending the war. Other European leaders also expressed...
